education:
Li Miao has been a Bachelor in School of mathematics and statistics from Zhengzhou University, China since 2012.
In 2016, she will be a Ph.D candidate at Embedded and Pervasive Computing (EPIC) Lab in School of Computer Science and Technology, HUST.
